original_title: Former CP councillor’s son, two others arrested over vehicle theft
original_body_lines: Three suspects including the son of a former Central Provincial Council member have been arrested in connection with the theft of three luxury jeeps and a van from a vehicle sales centre in Kengalla, Digana.
Two jeeps stolen by the suspects have been recovered in a garage behind the house of a former SLPP member at Pallegama, Doragamuwa.
The suspects were arrested on information received by the Wattegama police.
A gang of five who entered the sales centre yesterday morning had taken away three Defender jeeps and a van. (J.A.L. Jayasinghe)
